mapper.select: SELECT id, name, power, status, reg_date, modified_date, 'viewer' as type, (SELECT count(*) FROM luggage WHERE check_id = A.id AND type = 'P') AS pass_luggage, (SELECT count(*) FROM luggage WHERE check_id = A.id AND type = 'O') AS open_luggage, (SELECT count(*) FROM luggage WHERE check_id = A.id) AS total_luggage FROM device A WHERE type = 'C'
SELECT count(*) FROM device WHERE status = 'waiting' AND type = 'C'
SELECT count(*) FROM device WHERE status = 'working' AND type = 'C'
SELECT id, name, power, status, reg_date, modified_date, 'xray' as type, (SELECT count(*) FROM luggage WHERE xray_id = A.id) AS total_luggage FROM device A WHERE type = 'X'
SELECT count(*) FROM device WHERE status = 'waiting' AND type = 'X'
SELECT count(*) FROM device WHERE status = 'working' AND type = 'X'
SELECT id, name, power, status, reg_date, modified_date, 'trs' as type, (SELECT count(*) FROM luggage WHERE trs_id = A.id) AS total_luggage FROM device A WHERE type = 'T'
SELECT count(*) FROM device WHERE status = 'waiting' AND type = 'T'
SELECT count(*) FROM device WHERE status = 'working' AND type = 'T'
SELECT id, name, type FROM ( SELECT id, name, 'viewer' as type FROM viewer_info Union SELECT id, name , 'xray' as type FROM xray_info ) as subquery;
